issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Yazdgerd II on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with two mural element, crescent, above covered korymbos; two ribbons commencing to the left below crescent, pointing upwards; pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing below ball of hair, pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); floral elements below bust; floral elements below bust; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h l. o. mzdysn ORHYA kdy yzdklty| mazdēsn bay kay Yazdgerd|"The Mazda-worshiping divine king Yazdgerd"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; on the shaft l’st (rāst, “just”), to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; altar flames rendered in four tiers of four, three, two and one strokes respectively; to the left and the right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Yazdgerd II, holding a barsom with both hands, both figures facing inwards; nwky name at 3h; dotted border
